title: [D+] Flux ESC LF Toplane
body:
Flux ESC is searching for a top to complete the roster for the second split of  2017 OOL, with the goal of achieving OCS.

Requirements:
- Availability to scrim most weeknights, and weekends for tournament.
- A strong ability to receive constructive criticism.
- A working microphone.
 - Competitive experience is a plus, but not required.


What we have to offer:
- Support staff to assist in achieving the goal of OCS.
---- Head coach
---- Personal coach
---- Analyst
---- Manager

If you are interested in applying, please contact myself (Flip), or our owner (vki) in game.
